title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: Label font size doesn't change right away it is modified.
Steps to reproduce:1. Add a label and edit its font size as '18 points'.
OB: When modifying the font size of a label, the height of the label does not change immediately in the user interface.
EB: The label height should automatically adjust to match the new font size after modifying it.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Edit the font size of the label to be '18 points'.
